mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_show_table ( b_show_id, b_show_title, b_show_label, b_show_time, b_simple_content, b_full_content, b_send_flag, b_pic_url, b_show_ip, b_author_id) VALUES ( #{blogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogSimpleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blogPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogAuthorId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

INSERT INTO reply_show_table ( r_show_id, r_show_content, r_show_time, r_show_ip, r_blog_id, r_author_id) VALUES( #{replyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyBlogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyAuthorId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT b.b_show_id, b.b_show_title, b.b_show_label, b.b_show_time, b.b_simple_content, b.b_pic_url, b.b_author_id, u.user_name, p.p_show_count FROM blog_show_table b RIGHT JOIN user_table u ON b.b_author_id = u.user_id RIGHT JOIN pv_show_table p ON b.b_show_id = p.b_show_id WHERE b.b_send_flag = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY b.b_show_time DESC

SELECT b.b_show_id, b.b_show_title, b.b_show_label, b.b_show_time, b.b_full_content, b.b_pic_url, b.b_author_id, u.user_name, p.p_show_count FROM blog_show_table b RIGHT JOIN user_table u ON b.b_author_id = u.user_id RIGHT JOIN pv_show_table p ON b.b_show_id = p.b_show_id WHERE b.b_show_id = #{blogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT r.r_show_id, r.r_show_content, r.r_show_time, r.r_show_ip, r.r_author_id, u.user_name FROM reply_show_table r RIGHT JOIN user_table u ON r.r_author_id = u.user_id WHERE r.r_blog_id = #{blogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
